heading: Overview
body: The Hyundai Signature Sales Journey is a comprehensive, step-by-step training program designed to empower our sales team with the mindset, skills, and consistency needed to deliver exceptional experiences.
notes: Top-of-module narrative. Use as the module opening.

heading: Trust + Best Price Promise
body: At Clark Hyundai, we’ve reimagined the car-buying process around a single idea: trust. Our Best Price Promise ensures every guest receives real, market-based pricing upfront — no haggling, no games, and no pressure. Instead of focusing on persuasion, our team is free to focus on what matters most: listening, understanding, and helping.
bullets: One clear price|One consistent experience|One focus: the customer

heading: The Natural Sales Process (NSP)
body: The Natural Sales Process is the heart of our customer engagement model. The buyer doesn’t feel sold, and the consultant doesn’t feel like they’re selling — yet the engagement often culminates in a transaction rooted in transparency and trust.

heading: NSP Quote
quote: Here, guests never feel they’re being sold to, and consultants don’t feel they’re selling, even though the engagement often culminates in a transaction.
notes: Use this as a pull-quote in training decks.

heading: What You’ll Learn
body: This approach elevates the experience by centering the conversation on the guest’s interests and filtering out the unnecessary.
bullets: Building Genuine Relationships|Active Listening|Educate and Inform|Solution-Oriented Consulting|Transparent Engagement|Natural Follow-Up|Fostering Referrals|Continuous Evolution

heading: Our Modular Training Framework
body: Our Modular Training Framework is both flexible and structured, offering an engaging and adaptive learning environment tailored to the diverse needs of our sales team.
notes: Use as the explanation for why modules exist.

heading: Training Focus
body: By aligning this framework with our long-term business vision, we create a culture of high performance, high trust, and long-term growth — for our team and for our customers.
bullets: Honing Sales Performance|Enhancing Customer Interactions|Boosting Satisfaction
